exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term A n nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c p, q : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q H1 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n b c H2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (spminusf ?M2278 ?M2279 ?M2280 ?M2281 ?M2283) (spminusf ?M2278 ?M2279 ?M2280 ?M2282 ?M2283)" with "eqP A eqA n (spminusf (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) c nZc (mults multA (n:=n) a p) q) (mults multA (n:=n) a (spminusf b c nZc p q))".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term A n nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c p, q : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q H1 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n b c H2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a Unable to unify "eqP ?M2278 ?M2281 ?M2289 (pluspf ?M2279 ?M2282 ?M2288 ?M2291 (pX ?M2293 (pO ?M2278 ?M2289)) ?M2294) (pX ?M2293 ?M2294)" with "eqP A eqA n (spminusf (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) c nZc (mults multA (n:=n) a p) q) (mults multA (n:=n) a (spminusf b c nZc p q))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c) (p q : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> divP A A0 eqA multA divA n b c -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqP A eqA n (spminusf (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) c nZc (mults multA (n:=n) a p) q) (mults multA (n:=n) a (spminusf b c nZc p q))

Premises:
zeroP : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
mults : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
spminusf : Term A n -> forall b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
eqP : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop

Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
divP : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop

pluspf_inv3b : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q)) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
minuspf_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec r s)
minuspf_pOmults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (pO A n) p) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) p)
spminusf_extend : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (p q : list (Term A n)), divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqP A eqA n (spminusf a b nZb p q) (spminusf a b nZb (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))

canonical_mults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (m : Term A n) (l : list (Term A n)), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) m -> canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (mults multA (n:=n) m l)
mults_invTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a) p)) (pO A n)
